title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 66.3 - Waiver of announced parts of an examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 66.3 - Waiver of announced parts of an examination

State Regulations
[Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, ยง7 ] A test, stated in the announcement to be planned part of an examination, may
nevertheless be waived and the eligible list established on the basis of scores
in the other announced competitively rated part or parts of the examination
when the number of candidates successful in the preceding part or parts of the
examination does not exceed by more than two the number of vacancies to be
filled from such eligible list which exist at the time of the establishment of
the eligible list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
66.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
